channel.title: Xbox - Black Ops
channel.description: Anybody interested in playing with me? If so, send me a message.

item.title: Xbox - Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:34, topic:380219”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=476057.msg3516443#msg3516443 date=1299029566]
Its fun and all but I prefer just normal, less spraying.
[/quote]

Do you get a choice between playing Vietnam and normal, or does it mix them together?[/quote]it gives a new tab to the menu with Vietnam thats all. Then from there you get to pick the map you want to use, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox - Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:32, topic:380219”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=476057.msg3516437#msg3516437 date=1299029383]

Havent played the Vietnam addon, the standard 12 maps are big enough and amazing enough to last.

The add-on was free, right? I’m guessing it was just new maps too?
[/quote]New maps, weps, and tanks(cars etc) and you got to pay for vietnam. I have it everyone just spams flame thrower.

Ah, just looked it up. I will look up some more reviews before I buy, and will see if it’s worth it for $15.[/quote]Its fun and all but I prefer just normal, less spraying.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox - Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:27, topic:380219”]Battlefield 3: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jb-mzhCTznQ

The most amazing fucking thing in the universe. 2011 will be the year CoD falls, like it should have after 4.[/quote]

I finally popped in BC2 and downloaded that 1.64GB Vietnam update (in which I don’t know what that is, so in case I forget, care to explain anyone?) after not playing for awhile. Got into a game immediately, it’s so much fun if you know how to play decently. Only flaw is a lot of recons not playing the objective, but that won’t change as long as there is more realistic sniping like BC2 has to offer.

Read full topic

item.description:

CoD is strictly for hacking and Zombies. Understood? (I also want to point out how shitty CoD is having to update every 15 minutes with a crucial patch. Pokemon Blue, never once updated, very few if any errors)

item.title: Xbox - Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:20, topic:380219”][quote author=Frell link=topic=476057.msg3482571#msg3482571 date=1296309455]
No, all call of duty games suck except 4.
[/quote]
Except CoD2! Can’t forget the good old days.

Call of Duty is so inaccurate, since when have you been able to point a gun at someone, look down the scope and have it perfectly inline with their head?

It’s a video game derrrrrr[/quote]

There are realistic video games derrrrrr

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox - Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

ranger squad:

Call of Duty is so inaccurate, since when have you been able to point a gun at someone, look down the scope and have it perfectly inline with their head?

Video games are made to be fun, not 100% realistic.
Minecraft for example; almost nothing has gravity.
Runescape; I needn’t explain.
Halo; Aliens ‘n’ shit.
Etc.

Read full topic
